title: RNC Preview, Hogan Gidley, Hurricane Laura
itunes:title: RNC Preview, Hogan Gidley, Hurricane Laura
description:
Guests: Hogan Gidley, Trump 2020 National Press Secretary, Rob Carolan, Bloomberg meteorologist, Brian Morgenstern, Special Assistant to the President, WH Deputy Press Secretary and Deputy Communication Director, Bryan Lanza, Republican Strategist, and former Deputy Communications Director for the Trump 2016 campaign, and Doug Thornell, Partner & Head of SKDKPolitical at SKDKnickerbocker, and former lead media strategist to the DNC.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
